en.title: Ride request has timed out
en.body: Unfortunately we were not able to find you a ride, please try again later.

es.title: Tiempo de espera agotado
es.body: Lamentablemente, no pudimos encontrarle transporte. Vuelva a intentarlo más tarde.

en.title: Your driver is on the way
en.body: Your driver will arrive shortly to pick you up, please be ready.

es.title: Tu chofer esta en camino
es.body: Tu chofer llegará en breve para recogerlo, esté listo.

en.title: Your ride has begun
en.body: Your driver has indicated that he has picked you up, if there has been an error, please report to us.

es.title: Tu viaje ha comenzado
es.body: Tu chófer ha indicado que lo ha recogido, si ha habido un error, infórmenos.

en.title: Your ride has finished
en.body: Your driver has indicated that he has dropped you off, if there has been an error, please report to us.

es.title: Tu viaje ha terminado
es.body: Tu chófer ha indicado que lo ha dejado, si ha habido un error, infórmenos.

en.title: Your ride has been cancelled
en.body: Sorry to inform you that your ride has been cancelled.

es.title: Tu viaje ha sido cancelado
es.body: Lamento informarle que su viaje ha sido cancelado.

en.title: Your order is being prepared
en.body: Restaurant has recieved your order and has begun preparation.

es.title: Se está preparando tu pedido
es.body: El restaurante ha recibido su pedido y ha comenzado a prepararlo.

en.title: Your order is ready for pickup
en.body: Restaurant has finished preparing your order is awaiting pickup.

es.title: Tu pedido está listo para ser recogido.
es.body: El restaurante ha terminado de preparar su pedido y está a la espera de que lo recojan.

en.title: Your delivery is on the way
en.body: Driver has picked up your order and is on the way.

es.title: Tu entrega está en camino
es.body: El conductor ha recogido su pedido y está en camino.

en.title: Your order has been delivered
en.body: Driver has indicated that he has dropped off your order, if there has been an error, please report to us.

es.title: Tu pedido ha sido entregado
es.body: El conductor ha indicado que ha devuelto su pedido, si ha habido un error, infórmenos.

en.title: Order has been cancelled
en.body: Sorry to inform you that customer has cancelled the order.

es.title: Pedido ha sido cancelado
es.body: Lamento informarle que el client ha cancelado el pedido.

en.title: Order has been cancelled
en.body: Sorry to inform you that order has been cancelled.

es.title: Pedido ha sido cancelado
es.body: Lamento informarle que el pedido ha sido cancelado.
